metadata.title: CVE-2020-25623 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Erlang/OTP 22.3.x before 22.3.4.6 and 23.x before 23.1 allows DirectoryTraversal. An attacker can send a crafted HTTP request to read arbitraryfiles, if httpd in the inets application is used.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25623` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

erlang - 1:18.3-dfsg-1ubuntu3.1
erlang-asn1 - 1:18.3-dfsg-1ubuntu3.1
erlang-base - 1:18.3-dfsg-1ubuntu3.1
